item.title: Certified Salesforce Platform App Builder – Part 1: Exam Overview
item.description: In order to prepare and pass the Salesforce App Builder Exam I follow the learning path as described in the official “Certified Salesforce Platform App Builder Study Guide“. But how many questions on each topic have to be answered in the exam? The total number of questions is 60 and the expected number of questions on each topic can easily be calculated: Overview of exam questions per topic Topic Weight Questions Business Logic and Process Automation 27% 16,2 Data Modeling and Management 20% 12 User Interface 14% 8,4 Security 10% 6 Salesforce Fundamentals 8% 4,8 App Deployment 8% 4,8 Reporting 5% 3 Mobile 5% 3 Social 3% 1,8 Total 100% 60 My strategy is to begin with the most important topic with the most questions and work my way down to the end of the list.
